main event: Witnesses observed six white colored lights in the sky over Elkhorn, Kentucky on March 21, 1967.
interesting points: The lights were compared to those of an airliner but did not behave like one,The objects were observed for approximately 5 minutes,The witnesses described the lights as changing colors from bright white to green,No sound was emitted from the objects,Three persons including a mother and her son-in-law witnessed the sighting.
sighted object: six white lights in the sky
witness description: witnessed by a mother and her family members
